title: Understanding the Purpose of Comments
text: Comments in code are used to explain the purpose or functionality of a particular section of code. They are not executed by the program but serve as a guide for anyone reading the code.

title: Identifying the Correct Use of Comments
text: Consider why a programmer might include comments in their code. Is it to make the code run faster, to execute a function, or to provide clarity and understanding?

hintAnswer: using comments to remember the purpose of the code or help somebody else understand the code
title: Choosing the Correct Answer
text: Select the correct purpose of using comments in code from the options provided.
choices: using comments to remember the purpose of the code or help somebody else understand the code
>to execute a specific function in the code
>to increase the speed of the program
